price: 176. Oo yey ku murugo gelin kuwa ugu dhaca gaalnimada si degdeg ah37; hubaal iyagu waxba ma yeeli karaan Alle marnaba. Alle Wuxuu rabaa in aanay ku yeelan wax qayb ah Aakhirada, waxayna leeyihiin cadaab daran.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡكُفۡرِۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَلَّا يَجۡعَلَ لَهُمۡ حَظّٗا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
footnotes: 37. Xaalka munaafiqiinta ku dhex jira muslimiinta.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥzunka alladhīna yusāriʿūna fī al-kuf'ri innahum lan yaḍurrū al-laha shayan yurīdu al-lahu allā yajʿala lahum ḥaẓẓan fī al-ākhirati walahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
